text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Eluktronics P640RE Premium Gaming Laptop PC - Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 3GB 970M GTX GDDR5 14.0” Full HD IPS Display 128GB Eluktro Pro-X PCIe SSD + 1TB Hybrid HDD 8GB DDR4 RAM. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Had several issues with the Eluktronics P640RE Premium Gaming Laptop PC - Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 3GB 970M GTX GDDR5 14.0” Full HD IPS Display 128GB Eluktro Pro-X PCIe SSD + 1TB Hybrid HDD 8GB DDR4 RAM since day one. blue screens occasionally and the fan noise feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Eluktronics P640RE Premium Gaming Laptop PC - Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 3GB 970M GTX GDDR5 14.0” Full HD IPS Display 128GB Eluktro Pro-X PCIe SSD + 1TB Hybrid HDD 8GB DDR4 RAM. It overheats frequently when playing Call of Duty: Warzone, and the performance throttles significantly. The battery life has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Eluktronics P640RE Premium Gaming Laptop PC - Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 3GB 970M GTX GDDR5 14.0” Full HD IPS Display 128GB Eluktro Pro-X PCIe SSD + 1TB Hybrid HDD 8GB DDR4 RAM. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Eluktronics P640RE Premium Gaming Laptop PC - Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 3GB 970M GTX GDDR5 14.0” Full HD IPS Display 128GB Eluktro Pro-X PCIe SSD + 1TB Hybrid HDD 8GB DDR4 RAM. The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
